beaked:Insight.NAME: Insight
beaked:Insight.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, shuffle an *Inspiration into your draw pile.
beaked:Insight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, shuffle an *Inspiration into your draw pile.

beaked:Inspiration.NAME: Inspiration
beaked:Inspiration.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When drawn, Exhaust this and draw 2 more cards.

beaked:Evade.NAME: Evade
beaked:Evade.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, gain [E] [E].
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: This enemy doesn't intend to attack.

beaked:Overpower.NAME: Overpower
beaked:Overpower.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals 1 additional damage for every !M! HP you currently have.

beaked:DarkPact.NAME: Dark Pact
beaked:DarkPact.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! beaked:Plated_Armor. NL Shuffle a *Regret into your draw pile.

beaked:Roost.NAME: Roost
beaked:Roost.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Increase this card's cost by 1 for the rest of combat.

beaked:HuntressEssence.NAME: Huntress Essence
beaked:HuntressEssence.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP and draw 1 card for each card in your Exhaust pile. NL Exhaust.

beaked:MachineEssence.NAME: Machine Essence
beaked:MachineEssence.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you receive healing, heal an additional !M! HP.

beaked:WarriorEssence.NAME: Warrior Essence
beaked:WarriorEssence.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy X times. Heal for 25% of unblocked damage dealt. NL Exhaust.
beaked:WarriorEssence.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy X+1 times. Heal for 25% of unblocked damage dealt. NL Exhaust.

beaked:FakeOut.NAME: Fake Out
beaked:FakeOut.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Swap your draw pile and discard pile.

beaked:Hexing.NAME: Hexing
beaked:Hexing.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, apply 2 Weak and 1 Vulnerable to all enemies that don't intend to attack.

beaked:Redirect.NAME: Redirect
beaked:Redirect.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to !beaked:wI! times your Strength, then lose all Strength. NL beaked:Wither 1.

beaked:DesperateSwing.NAME: Desperate Swing
beaked:DesperateSwing.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals 1 additional damage for every !M! points of HP missing.

beaked:Foresight.NAME: Foresight
beaked:Foresight.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, gain [E].
beaked:Foresight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, gain [E] [E].

beaked:Resilience.NAME: Resilience
beaked:Resilience.DESCRIPTION: Lose 3 Strength. NL Lose !M! HP. NL Gain 2 Artifact.

beaked:Respite.NAME: Respite
beaked:Respite.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL At the end of your turn, heal !M! HP.

beaked:TuckingFeathers.NAME: Tucking Feathers
beaked:TuckingFeathers.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. Gain Block equal to their total cost.

beaked:Negation.NAME: Negation
beaked:Negation.DESCRIPTION: Ignore the next beaked:Wither effect this combat. NL Exhaust.
beaked:Negation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ignore the next !M! beaked:Wither effects this combat. NL Exhaust.

beaked:Psalm.NAME: Psalm
beaked:Psalm.DESCRIPTION: Deal !beaked:wD! damage to ALL enemies. NL beaked:Wither !M!.

beaked:Struggle.NAME: Struggle
beaked:Struggle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each other card in your hand. End your turn.

beaked:Devastation.NAME: Devastation
beaked:Devastation.DESCRIPTION: When you draw a beaked:Depleted card, draw !M! more card.
beaked:Devastation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When you draw a beaked:Depleted card, draw !M! more cards.

beaked:Sacrifice.NAME: Sacrifice
beaked:Sacrifice.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Enemy heals for !M! HP. NL If Fatal, raise your Max HP by 3. Exhaust.

beaked:Brainwash.NAME: Brainwash
beaked:Brainwash.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all beaked:Depleted cards in your hand. NL Retain your hand this turn. NL Exhaust.
beaked:Brainwash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Exhaust all beaked:Depleted cards in your hand. NL Retain your hand this turn. NL Exhaust.

beaked:DarkTribute.NAME: Dark Tribute
beaked:DarkTribute.DESCRIPTION: Heal ALL HP. NL Gain !beaked:wI! Poison. NL beaked:Wither !M!.

beaked:LiftOff.NAME: Lift Off
beaked:LiftOff.DESCRIPTION: Take 50% less damage from attacks. If you are attacked !M! times in one turn, lose this power and skip your next turn.

beaked:FullHouse.NAME: Full House
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Decreases the number of cards drawn.

beaked:Caw.NAME: CAW!
beaked:Caw.DESCRIPTION: Deal !beaked:wD! damage to ALL enemies X times. Apply X Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL beaked:Wither !M!.
beaked:Caw.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !beaked:wD! damage to ALL enemies X+1 times. Apply X+1 Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL beaked:Wither !M!.

beaked:SacrificialScars.NAME: Sacrificial Scars
beaked:SacrificialScars.DESCRIPTION: Lose 6 HP. NL Gain !M! Max HP. NL You cannot heal for 3 turns. NL Exhaust.
beaked:SacrificialScars.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose 7 HP. NL Gain !M! Max HP. NL You cannot heal for 3 turns. Exhaust.

beaked:AwakenedForm.NAME: Awakened Form
beaked:AwakenedForm.DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 less [E] for each Boss killed. NL Cards cost 1 less [E].

beaked:BounceBack.NAME: Bounce Back
beaked:BounceBack.DESCRIPTION: Remove all of your Debuffs. NL Exhaust.

beaked:StickSmack.NAME: Stick Smack
beaked:StickSmack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle a *Stick into your draw pile.
beaked:StickSmack.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle an Upgraded *Stick into your draw pile.

beaked:Stick.NAME: Stick
beaked:Stick.DESCRIPTION: ALL *Stick *Smacks deal !M! additional damage this combat. Return the last-played *Stick *Smack to your hand.

beaked:WarriorSpirit.NAME: Warrior Spirit
beaked:WarriorSpirit.DESCRIPTION: Your next Attack this turn is played twice. NL Gain Strength equal to its cost. NL Exhaust.
beaked:WarriorSpirit.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Your next Attack this turn is played twice. NL Gain Strength equal to twice its cost. NL Exhaust.

beaked:HuntressSpirit.NAME: Huntress Spirit
beaked:HuntressSpirit.DESCRIPTION: Your next Skill this turn is played twice. NL Gain Dexterity equal to its cost. NL Exhaust.
beaked:HuntressSpirit.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Your next Skill this turn is played twice. NL Gain Dexterity equal to twice its cost. NL Exhaust.

beaked:MachineSpirit.NAME: Machine Spirit
beaked:MachineSpirit.DESCRIPTION: Your next Power this turn is played twice. NL Heal for 3 times its cost. NL Exhaust.
beaked:MachineSpirit.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Your next Power this turn is played twice. NL Heal for 5 times its cost. NL Exhaust.

beaked:WildInstinct.NAME: Wild Instinct
beaked:WildInstinct.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL If you have less than 50% HP when drawn, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

beaked:Tradeoff.NAME: Tradeoff
beaked:Tradeoff.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !beaked:wI! random card{^s^} in your hand. NL beaked:Wither -1. NL Draw !M! card{s}.

beaked:BloodForTheGods.NAME: Blood For The Gods
beaked:BloodForTheGods.DESCRIPTION: Take !M! damage. NL Next turn, heal twice that much HP.

beaked:Poke.NAME: Poke
beaked:Poke.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card{s}. NL |If it's an Attack|{For each Attack drawn this way}, deal !D! damage.

beaked:Replenish.NAME: Replenish
beaked:Replenish.DESCRIPTION: Replenish !M! use{s} of a beaked:Wither card in your hand.

beaked:Brace.NAME: Brace
beaked:Brace.DESCRIPTION: Retain. Gain !B! Block. NL Block increases by !M! for each card you play while this is in your hand. Exhaust.

beaked:Molting.NAME: Molting
beaked:Molting.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card. NL Gain !B! Block, or !beaked:B+M! Block if it was a beaked:Depleted card.

beaked:DigDeep.NAME: Dig Deep
beaked:DigDeep.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP for each Ritual you have. NL Exhaust.

beaked:DigDeeper.NAME: Dig Deeper
beaked:DigDeeper.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP for each Strength you have. NL Lose all Strength. NL Exhaust.
beaked:DigDeeper.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP for each Strength you have. NL Lose all Strength.

beaked:SacrificialAttack.NAME: Sacrificial Attack
beaked:SacrificialAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Strength affects Sacrificial Attack !M! time{s}. NL Lose all Strength.

beaked:BarbedWire.NAME: Barbed Wire
beaked:BarbedWire.DESCRIPTION: Gain Thorns equal to your Strength. NL Lose all Strength.

beaked:PrayerOfSafety.NAME: Prayer of Safety
beaked:PrayerOfSafety.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Intangible. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Lose !M! Dexterity.

beaked:Overexert.NAME: Overexert
beaked:Overexert.DESCRIPTION: Double your Energy. NL For each Energy gained, lose !M! HP.

beaked:RuinSticks.NAME: Ruin Sticks
beaked:RuinSticks.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a *Regret to your hand.

beaked:SacrificialDive.NAME: Sacrificial Dive
beaked:SacrificialDive.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, lose HP equal to half of its total attack damage. It loses 99 Strength this turn. NL Exhaust.
beaked:SacrificialDive.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, lose HP equal to half of its total attack damage. It loses 99 Strength this turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: This enemy doesn't intend to attack.

beaked:FeelMyPain.NAME: Feel My Pain
beaked:FeelMyPain.DESCRIPTION: Lose 50% of your current HP. NL Gain !M! Strength.

beaked:Mantra.NAME: Mantra
beaked:Mantra.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for every beaked:Wither card in your deck.

beaked:Windmill.NAME: Windmill
beaked:Windmill.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you play a Skill this turn, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

beaked:MaddeningMurmurs.NAME: Maddening Murmurs
beaked:MaddeningMurmurs.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, place a random card from your discard pile into your hand. It costs 1 less this turn.
beaked:MaddeningMurmurs.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, place a random card from your discard pile into your hand. It costs 0 this turn.

beaked:TurnTheTables.NAME: Turn the Tables
beaked:TurnTheTables.DESCRIPTION: Replace ALL enemies' Weak with Vulnerable.
beaked:TurnTheTables.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Replace ALL enemies' Weak with Vulnerable. Apply 1 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

beaked:Cower.NAME: Cower
beaked:Cower.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Vulnerable. NL Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

beaked:VolatileMisfortune.NAME: Volatile Misfortune
beaked:VolatileMisfortune.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, Retain all Unplayable cards. For each, deal damage to a random enemy equal to your Strength + 1.
beaked:VolatileMisfortune.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. At the end of your turn, Retain all Unplayable cards. For each, deal damage to a random enemy equal to your Strength + 1.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Certain #yUnplayable cards, like #yBurns, automatically discard themselves at the end of your turn. These are ignored by Volatile Misfortune.

beaked:SurvivalInstinct.NAME: Survival Instinct
beaked:SurvivalInstinct.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Can only be played if you haven't played any other cards this turn. NL Gain 1 Intangible. NL Become beaked:Entangled.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I have played other cards this turn!

beaked:ShadowFade.NAME: Shadow Fade
beaked:ShadowFade.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Intangible for each !M! Strength you have. NL Lose all Strength.

beaked:StunningBlow.NAME: Stunning Blow
beaked:StunningBlow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !beaked:wD! damage. NL Gain 1 Intangible. NL beaked:Wither !M!.

beaked:WindBringer.NAME: Wind Bringer
beaked:WindBringer.DESCRIPTION: Deal !beaked:wD! damage to ALL enemies. NL beaked:Wither !M!.

beaked:CheekyTricks.NAME: Deep Focus
beaked:CheekyTricks.DESCRIPTION: Ignore the next !beaked:wI! beaked:Wither effect{^s^} this combat. NL beaked:Wither !M!.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Decreases #yWither effects ignored. This card does not prevent its own #yWither effect.

beaked:MimicWarrior.NAME: Mimic Warrior
beaked:MimicWarrior.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Ironclad card to your hand. It costs 0 this turn.
beaked:MimicWarrior.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a random Upgraded Ironclad card to your hand. It costs 0 this turn.

beaked:MimicHuntress.NAME: Mimic Huntress
beaked:MimicHuntress.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Silent card to your hand. It costs 0 this turn.
beaked:MimicHuntress.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a random Upgraded Silent card to your hand. It costs 0 this turn.

beaked:MimicMachine.NAME: Mimic Machine
beaked:MimicMachine.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Defect card to your hand. It costs 0 this turn.
beaked:MimicMachine.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a random Upgraded Defect card to your hand. It costs 0 this turn.

beaked:CrazyRituals.NAME: Crazy Rituals
beaked:CrazyRituals.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a random card of a random color on a random target.

beaked:RitualOfBody.NAME: Ritual Of Body
beaked:RitualOfBody.DESCRIPTION: Spend 1 Ritual. Gain !M! beaked:Plated_Armor at the start of each turn.

beaked:NobsRage.NAME: Nob's Rage
beaked:NobsRage.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you are attacked, gain !M! Strength.

beaked:LagavulinsFerocity.NAME: Lagavulin's Ferocity
beaked:LagavulinsFerocity.DESCRIPTION: The first Attack you play each turn deals double damage.
beaked:LagavulinsFerocity.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The first Attack you play each turn deals triple damage.

beaked:SentriesPulse.NAME: Sentry's Pulse
beaked:SentriesPulse.DESCRIPTION: Remove ALL Buffs from an enemy.
beaked:SentriesPulse.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Remove ALL Buffs from ALL enemies.

beaked:BooksFlurry.NAME: Book's Flurry
beaked:BooksFlurry.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! (non-attack) damage for every card played this combat.

beaked:NemesisSlickness.NAME: Nemesis' Slickness
beaked:NemesisSlickness.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Intangible. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

beaked:HeadsImpatience.NAME: Head's Impatience
beaked:HeadsImpatience.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain !M! Strength until the end of your turn.

beaked:ReptomancersBite.NAME: Reptomancer's Bite
beaked:ReptomancersBite.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Remove target's Artifact. NL Apply 99 Weak. NL Apply 99 Vulnerable.

beaked:KnowThyFoe.NAME: Know Thy Foe
beaked:KnowThyFoe.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Elite card to your hand. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Powerful 0-cost cards that reflect some of the Spire's strongest foes.

beaked:VigorBurst.NAME: Vigor Burst
beaked:VigorBurst.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When drawn, heal !M! HP. NL When added to your deck, gain 5 Max HP. If removed or transformed from your deck, lose 5 Max HP.
beaked:VigorBurst.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When drawn, heal !M! HP. NL When added to your deck, gain 5 Max HP.
